sentences.en: He cast a furtive glance at her.
He is furtive in his manner.
He saw Fabrizzio take a look over his shoulder, a look that was somehow furtive.
sentences.cn: 他还看到法市里吉奥回头看了一下, 神色莫名其妙,有点鬼鬼祟祟.

sentences.en: He took a furtive glance at the clock.
He was a young man with furtive eyes and a sullen look.
sentences.cn: 这人很年青,贼眉鼠眼,满脸丧气.

sentences.en: His furtive behaviour aroused our suspicion.
sentences.cn: 他鬼鬼祟祟的行为引起了我们的怀疑.

sentences.en: It was the almost furtive restlessness and irritability that had possessed him.
sentences.cn: 那是一种一直纠缠着他的隐秘的不安和烦恼.

sentences.en: Occasionally I took a furtive glance at him.
sentences.cn: 偶尔我偷偷地望他一眼.

sentences.en: Presently the boy began to steal furtive glances at the girl.
sentences.cn: 这时汤姆偷偷地瞥了那女孩几次.

sentences.en: She cast a furtive glance over her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她心里不安，回头偷偷瞥了一下。

sentences.en: She was furtive and vicious by temperament.
sentences.cn: 她本来做事就偷偷摸摸，心肠狠毒。

sentences.en: The man's furtive manner gave rise to the suspicion of the theft among the policemen.
sentences.cn: 那个男人鬼鬼祟祟的样子,引起警察怀疑盗窃案是他作的案.

sentences.en: The man's furtive manner made the policeman follow him.
sentences.cn: 这人鬼鬼祟祟的举止引得警察跟踪了他.

sentences.en: The phrase was furtive, sly, yet triumphant.
sentences.cn: 这话说得鬼鬼祟祟, 狡诈, 却得意.

sentences.en: Their voices, their very glances, became furtive and repressed.
sentences.cn: 他们说话的声音, 他们的眼光, 变得那么提心吊胆,拘拘束束的.

sentences.en: There was something furtive about his actions.
sentences.cn: 他的行为有点鬼鬼祟祟。

trans.tran_cn: 鬼鬼祟祟的，诡诈的，贼头贼脑
trans.tran_en: behaving as if you want to keep something secret
